instruction: Re-design a logo for a company specializing in eco-friendly farming.
output: The logo I created is of three green leaves forming a circle with a sun in the center. The sun is yellow, with a few intermittent rays of orange radiating from it. On the left side of the circle there is a green stem with two green arrows pointing upward, as if to represent a rising natural force. The stem is curved and the arrows point in different directions, showing the idea of growth and diversity. The circle is surrounded by two green arcs, which represent the eco-friendly approach of the company. The text "Eco-Farming" appears in bold black letters at the bottom of the logo.
